element.sql: SELECT @rownum ::= @rownum +1 rwnum, t.dtDate, IF(chh.id IS NULL, '-', CONCAT_WS('.', CAST(chh.pos AS CHAR), CAST(chz.number AS CHAR), CAST(chh.local_number AS CHAR))) chkNum, t.acType, t.acName, (t.balance - t.amount) nominal, (t.amount * -1) spend, t.date_from, t.date_to, IFNULL(tis.name, '-') store FROM (SELECT DATE(aj.`date`) dtDate, at.name acType, ac.name acName, acs.date_from, acs.date_to, aj.cash_id, aj.source_id, SUM(aj.balance) balance, SUM(aj.amount) amount FROM ukmserver.trm_in_account_type_certificates tc INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_account_type at ON tc.id = at.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.local_auth_account ac ON ac.account_type_id = at.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.local_auth_certificate_account acs ON ac.id = acs.account_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.local_auth_account_journal aj ON ac.id = aj.account_id AND aj.source_type = 1 WHERE aj.`date` BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE( :pFrom , '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( :pTo , '%Y-%m-%d') , INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY aj.account_id, DATE(aj.`date`), at.name, ac.name, acs.date_from, acs.date_to, aj.cash_id, aj.source_id) t LEFT OUTER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header chh ON chh.cash_id = t.cash_id AND chh.id = t.source_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_shift_open chz ON chh.cash_id = chz.cash_id AND chh.shift_open = chz.id LEFT OUTER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON chh.cash_id = tip.cash_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_store tis ON tip.store_id = tis.store_id, ( SELECT @rownum ::=0 ) r WHERE t.amount != 0 ORDER BY 1, 2
